listing_company_name: Gary Peer & Associates (St Kilda) - ST KILDA
description:
A secure lifestyle in one of Melbourne’s most luxurious residential buildings located in the premier residential area in Port Melbourne with elegant & sophisticated interiors. This lavish 3 bedroom, 2.5 bath townhouse offers an urban sanctuary showcasing the very best of inner-city living.
The premium resort-inspired excellence designed by highly renowned architect Elenberg Fraser & exquisite garden landscaping designed by Jack Melo offer residence some of the most luxurious facilities; including a health & wellness retreat with a fully equipped gymnasium, two swimming pools including a rooftop infinity pool & spas set amongst palm tree lined private cabanas. Take advantage of the 5 rooftop multi-function rooms which includes outdoor firepits, BBQ areas & cooking with communal dining. An exclusive lifestyle that offers a rooftop restaurant & bar, business suites, theatre, games room, library, with 24/7 concierge service.
From the moment you enter, this spectacular light-filled entertainer townhouse will genuinely impress from the very first step inside.
With its spacious floorplan & premium inclusions, this stunning brand-new tri-level townhouse delivers an outstanding modern lifestyle positioned to perfection. Quality at every turn, the home's first-class interior boasts far-reaching bright living & dining alongside an ultra-stylish kitchen boasting stone benches, tinted mirrored splashback & the full suite of high-performing Miele appliances including integrated dishwasher. All three substantially sized bedrooms are extensively robed & overflowing with natural light, serviced by a perfect pair of luxe bathrooms featuring integrated niches alongside Grohe rainfall showers, raised double vanity basin with integrated LED lighting. Features include video intercom entry, secure private dual basement car parking garage with storage, separate laundry room, ducted heating & cooling in every room, double glazing, double roller blinds & recessed down-lighting. Stroll out to your own private west-facing rooftop terrace spacious for an alfresco dining setting & your own personal designed space with fitting allowance for spa & outdoor kitchen to enjoy views of the Westgate & amazing Sunset.
Encapsulating the epitome of balance between Port Melbourne & city living, make the most of the suburb with nearby Bay Street restaurants, bars, shopping, Sandridge beach, Princes Pier, Woolworths, 3km from the CBD & 12 mins away to Melbourne Airport. From the striking views of the CBD skyline to the bespoke upgraded features that makes this bespoke townhouse stand out from the others, every day will feel like a holiday in this truly world-class complex.
